propertyType.name: InputSObjectType
propertyType.label: Input Collection SObject Type
propertyType.description: Generic sObject data type used for input sObject properties

property.name: inputValueList
property.label: Input Record Collection
property.description: The collection you want to de-dupe

property.name: fieldToDedupeOn
property.label: Field API To De Dupe On
property.description: This is case sensitive. Kindly provide Field Api Name in correct Case as mentioned in SFDC ObjectManager. The API Name of the unique field values you want to de-dupe all of the records on
